laboratory_examinations.findings: HbA1c was 6.7%, increased from 6.4% at the last visit.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Fasting glucose with C-peptide, 2-hour post-prandial urinary C-peptide to creatinine ratio (UCPCR), and antibody tests (GADA, IA-2A, ZnT8)
laboratory_examinations.findings: Three negative antibody tests (GADA, IA-2A, ZnT8).

laboratory_examinations.date: 6 months after starting GLP-1 RA treatment
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Improved from 8.7% to 6.2% after 6 months of GLP-1 RA treatment.
